summary.Title: Skilled warehouse employees Wanted for Customer in Taulov, Fredericia

summary.Presentation:
Skilled warehouse employees Wanted for Customer in Taulov, Fredericia
We are currently looking for skilled warehouse employees for our partners in the Taulov area.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Skilled warehouse employees Wanted for Customer in Taulov, Fredericia
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Skilled warehouse employees Wanted for Customer in Taulov, Fredericia

We are currently looking for skilled warehouse employees for our partners in the Taulov area. The tasks are typically sorting cardboard, picking/packing or emptying containers for goods. We are therefore looking for quality-conscious employees who take pride in the work they do.

Working hours are typically 4 days a week from 06:00 - 16:00

We offer:

  • Full-time position
  • Salary by according to agreement
  • A part of a good team

 

We expect you:

  • Speaks Danish or English
  • Is ready for physical work
  • Criminal record

 

If this interests you, then you can apply by clicking on the button "apply for this job", and you will then create a profile on our website.

Would you like to be part of a highly professional environment? Then do not hesitate to send us an application. If you have questions about the above job posting, you are always welcome to contact us by phone: 72 10 85 46.
